name: Far Cry 6: Lost Between Worlds
summary: Conquer life-or-death trials in this all-new Dani Rojas story. Lost Between Worlds is a rich, action-packed gauntlet with deadly crystal enemies, multiple player paths, all-new lore, and a wide variety of unique gameplay challenges.
